identityDocumentsIDVHint2: Select at least 2 documents. At least 1 of the documents must be from group A.
UK_or_EU_digital_tachograph_card: UK or EU driver digital tachograph card
UK_HM_veteran_card: UK HM Armed Forces Veteran Card
UK_firearms_licence: UK, Channel Islands and Isle of Man Firearms Licence
photoIdPradoHint: Such as a National Identity Card (Pakistan), crew member certificate (South Africa), or Permanent Resident Card (USA).
rental_agreement: UK local authority or social housing rental agreement (for the person’s current address)
mortgage_statement: Mortgage statement (for the person’s current address)
UK_council_tax_statement: UK council tax statement (for the person’s current address)
utility_bill: Utility bill (for the person’s current address)
error-identityDocumentsGroupANotSelected: Select at least one document from group A
